attributes.title: Season 1 Intro
attributes.caption:
Looks like we've got ourselves a team.

Watch gen:LOCK now, only on Rooster Teeth.
attributes.description:
Looks like we've got ourselves a team.

Watch gen:LOCK now, only on Rooster Teeth.

attributes.title: Character Reveal Teaser #1
attributes.caption: Dr. Weller (David Tennant) discusses with Colonel Marin (Monica Rial) the first recruit to join his gen:LOCK program to help the Vanguard's war effort.
attributes.description: Dr. Weller (David Tennant) discusses with Colonel Marin (Monica Rial) the first recruit to join his gen:LOCK program to help the Vanguard's war effort.

attributes.title: Character Reveal Teaser #2
attributes.caption: Dr. Weller (David Tennant) has a new recruit to join the Vanguard’s war efforts...but will his wild ideas have the impact he hopes?
attributes.description:
Dr. Weller (David Tennant) has a new recruit to join the Vanguard’s war efforts...but will his wild ideas have the impact he hopes?
gen:LOCK - coming January 2019, only on RoosterTeeth.com and mobile apps!

attributes.title: Character Reveal Teaser #3
attributes.caption:
Meet Dr. Weller's newest recruits for the Vanguard's war efforts.

gen:LOCK - coming January 2019, only on RoosterTeeth.com and mobile apps!
attributes.description:
Meet Dr. Weller's newest recruits for the Vanguard's war efforts.

gen:LOCK - coming January 2019, only on RoosterTeeth.com and mobile apps!

attributes.title: Character Reveal Teaser #4
attributes.caption: As the Union closes in, Dr. Weller (David Tennant) negotiates with Colonel Marin (Monica Rial) to approve all of his gen:LOCK candidates.
attributes.description: As the Union closes in, Dr. Weller (David Tennant) negotiates with Colonel Marin (Monica Rial) to approve all of his gen:LOCK candidates.

attributes.title: A First Look
attributes.caption: The newest gen:LOCK recruits have arrived at the Vanguard military base “the Anvil,” and are ready to settle in! That is until Doctor Weller explains there's a few more tests to endure before they're fully accepted into the program…
attributes.description:
The newest gen:LOCK recruits have arrived at the Vanguard military base “the Anvil,” and are ready to settle in! That is until Doctor Weller explains there's a few more tests to endure before they're fully accepted into the program…

See what's in store for the team when gen:LOCK premieres January 26, 2019 only on Rooster Teeth!

attributes.title: Episode One Preview - Buying Time
attributes.caption: Julian Chase (Michael B. Jordan) didn’t become one of the best fighter pilots in the Vanguard without taking risks. But if he goes too far, he may not make it through the war against the Union in one piece.
attributes.description: Julian Chase (Michael B. Jordan) didn’t become one of the best fighter pilots in the Vanguard without taking risks. But if he goes too far, he may not make it through the war against the Union in one piece.

attributes.title: Exclusive Episode One Preview - Miranda Meets the New Mechs
attributes.caption: A couple of uninvited guests arrive to help Miranda and the Vanguard hold the line against the Union.
attributes.description:
A couple of uninvited guests arrive to help Miranda and the Vanguard hold the line against the Union.

Michael B. Jordan, Maisie Williams, Dakota Fanning, and David Tennant star in gen:LOCK, premiering Saturday, January 26, exclusively on RoosterTeeth.com
attributes.display_title: Exclusive Episode One Preview - Miranda Meets the New Mechs

attributes.title: Michael B. Jordan on Anime
attributes.caption: As a long-time anime fan, Michael B. Jordan has a lot to say about the genre. Find out how he got into giant robots, who his favorite villain is, and even settle the greatest anime debate of all time.
attributes.description: As a long-time anime fan, Michael B. Jordan has a lot to say about the genre. Find out how he got into giant robots, who his favorite villain is, and even settle the greatest anime debate of all time.

attributes.title: Michael B. Jordan on his character Julian Chase
attributes.caption: You know Michael B. Jordan loves anime - now get an exclusive look at his experience voicing Julian Chase in Rooster Teeth's newest animated show gen:LOCK.
attributes.description: You know Michael B. Jordan loves anime - now get an exclusive look at his experience voicing Julian Chase in Rooster Teeth's newest animated show gen:LOCK.
attributes.display_title: Michael B. Jordan on his character Julian Chase

attributes.title: Official Trailer
attributes.caption: A daring team is recruited to pilot a new form of weaponized neuroscience that powers devastating mecha, but they must be willing to sacrifice everything to save the world.
attributes.description: Fifty years in the future, an oppressive authoritarian force threatens to conquer the world. A daring team is recruited to pilot a new form of weaponized neuroscience that powers devastating mecha, but they must be willing to sacrifice everything to save the world.

attributes.title: Michael B. Jordan Answers Classic Rooster Teeth Questions
attributes.caption: Is a hotdog a sandwich? Is water wet? Michael B. Jordan weighs in on the hard-hitting questions Rooster Teeth has been debating for years.
attributes.description: Is a hotdog a sandwich? Is water wet? Michael B. Jordan weighs in on the hard-hitting questions Rooster Teeth has been debating for years.
attributes.display_title: Michael B. Jordan Answers Classic Rooster Teeth Questions

attributes.title: Behind the Scenes
attributes.caption: What goes into the making of a new animated show? Hear from some of the creators behind gen:LOCK as they share their experiences and inspiration for Rooster Teeth's newest series.
attributes.description: What goes into the making of a new animated show? Hear from some of the creators behind gen:LOCK as they share their experiences and inspiration for Rooster Teeth's newest series.

attributes.title: Exclusive Episode 8 Preview
attributes.caption: The gen:LOCK team is ready for combat in their new upgraded mecha, but they aren’t the only ones with upgrades. Nemesis is back, and he’s out to destroy Chase.
attributes.description: The gen:LOCK team is ready for combat in their new upgraded mecha, but they aren’t the only ones with upgrades. Nemesis is back, and he’s out to destroy Chase.

attributes.title: The Best Fighters You've Ever Seen
attributes.caption: The gen:LOCK candidates have come a long way since being recruited for the program. Binge the season to see where they've ended up before the finale drops March 9, only on Rooster Teeth!
attributes.description: The gen:LOCK candidates have come a long way since being recruited for the program. Binge the season to see where they've ended up before the finale drops March 9, only on Rooster Teeth!
attributes.display_title: The Best Fighters You've Ever Seen

attributes.title: gen:LOCK - Chase
attributes.caption: When the Earth began to die and all seemed lost, Chase was born.
attributes.description: When the Earth began to die and all seemed lost, Chase was born. A natural born leader, Chase is able to keep a brave face in difficult times and lead the gen:LOCK team through victorious battles against the Union. Although he is only able to exist as a hologram or an upload, he is very much alive...maybe more than ever.

attributes.title: gen:Lock - Cammie
attributes.caption: Cammie is a brilliant hacker, coder, and engineer that can bend any piece of technology to her will.
attributes.description: Cammie is a brilliant hacker, coder, and engineer that can bend any piece of technology to her will. Along with being the brainiac of the gen:LOCK team, she is also the sensitive one in the group. Driven by her caring nature and desire for a family, Cammie is always encouraging the gen:LOCK crew to bond and work together.

attributes.title: gen:LOCK - State of the World
attributes.caption: In the aftermath of environmental devastation and total war, two dominant powers rose from the ashes with opposite ideas on how to rule the world - the Polity and the Union.
attributes.description: In the aftermath of environmental devastation and total war, two dominant powers rose from the ashes with opposite ideas on how to rule the world - the Polity and the Union.

attributes.title: gen:LOCK - Digitizing the Mind
attributes.caption: gen:LOCK enables its users to exist purely as a digital being in a digital world. While it was hoped to be used by all of humanity to escape a dying planet, only a few are capable of full digitization.
attributes.description: gen:LOCK enables its users to exist purely as a digital being in a digital world. While it was hoped to be used by all of humanity to escape a dying planet, only a few are capable of full digitization.
